scripts.pre-dev: yarn install --force --check-files --har && yarn bower && yarn modernizr && yarn build-webpack-dll && yarn lerna && yarn update-atom-plugins
scripts.start: cross-env HTTPS=false DLL=true BABEL_ENV=development NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=false ./node_modules/.bin/gulp serve
scripts.start-under-https: cross-env HTTPS=true BABEL_ENV=development NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=false ./node_modules/.bin/gulp serve
scripts.build-check: yarn validate && yarn lint && yarn test
scripts.build-local: yarn clear && yarn modernizr && cross-env DEBUG=false DLL=false TAR=true APIHOST='//localhost:6888' ./node_modules/.bin/gulp && yarn check-large-dirs
scripts.build-preview-local: yarn clear && yarn modernizr && cross-env DEBUG=false DLL=false TAR=false APIHOST='//localhost:6888' ./node_modules/.bin/gulp serve-with-build:dist
scripts.build-no-tar-local: yarn clear && yarn modernizr && cross-env DEBUG=false DLL=false TAR=false APIHOST='//localhost:6888' ./node_modules/.bin/gulp && yarn check-large-dirs
scripts.pre-online-local: yarn install && yarn bower && git stash && git checkout master && git pull && yarn modernizr && yarn build-webpack-dll && yarn build-check && yarn build-no-tar-local
scripts.online-local: yarn pre-online-local && cross-env IP=127.0.0.1 PORT=9000 BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=false ./node_modules/.bin/pm2 start ./server.js -i 0 -e pm2-error.txt -o pm2-log.txt -f --name dandan-com
